books.title: Fundamentals of Classical Mechanics
books.author: Dr. Ahmad Al-Kindi
books.description: A comprehensive introduction to classical mechanics covering Newtonian dynamics, conservation laws, rotational motion, and oscillations with modern applications.

books.title: Quantum Physics: Principles and Applications
books.author: Prof. Fatima Al-Haytham
books.description: An advanced textbook exploring quantum mechanics, wave functions, uncertainty principles, and quantum applications in modern technology.

books.title: Stellar Astrophysics and Galactic Structure
books.author: Dr. Omar Al-Battani
books.description: Explores stellar evolution, galactic dynamics, and cosmological structures with emphasis on observational techniques and theoretical frameworks.

books.title: Introduction to Thermodynamics
books.author: Dr. Lina Al-Farabi

books.title: Advanced Backend Security
books.author: Aya Mehjez
books.description: A practical guide to securing Express.js and Next.js APIs with real-world examples, middleware patterns, and deployment strategies.

books.title: Optimizing Backend Performance
books.author: Aya Mehjez
books.description: A deep dive into backend performance tuning, covering caching strategies, database indexing, load balancing, and profiling techniques for Express.js and Next.js APIs.

books.title: Documenting APIs Like a Pro
books.author: Aya Mehjez
books.description: A practical guide to writing clear, secure, and maintainable API documentation for backend systems. Covers OpenAPI, Swagger, versioning, and developer onboarding strategies.
